name: Virtual writing notebook
short_description:
"It is an application for learning and practising writing characters. It provides animations showing how to write the characters, explanations on their origin, ideas on how to learn them, their meaning, the different ways they can be read, their sounds and examples of their use.
The Writing screen lets users practise, providing immediate feedback on whether users keep to the right order or not. It also lets users write characters on their own and save their practice runs as an image on the device.
There are different types of exercises for in-depth practising of writing.
It is currently available for learning characters from Japanese. At some point in the future, it will also be available for Arabic and Chinese."
summary: A virtual assistant for learning characters in different languages
